word: H5115 - נָוָה - nâvâh - naw-vaw' - Keept at home - வீட்டில் வைக்கப்பட்ட

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: Keept at home / வீட்டில் வைக்கப்பட்ட
1) to beautify; (Hiphil) to beautify, to adorn
2) to dwell; (Qal) to dwell, to abide, to keep at home

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to rest (as at home); causatively (through the implied idea of beauty (compare H5116)), to celebrate (with praises): - keep at home, prepare an habitation.
Cognate: H4999, H5115, H5116, H5121
